name: DJ Escher
description:
M.C. Escher got tired of being an MC and decided to try being a DJ instead!

He throws hexagonal vinyl recordings of his favorite band of singing potatoes, so you have to catch as many as you can with your turntables.

Made for TINS 2021, with libsuperderpy engine entirely on a phone (Librem 5) in Qt Creator, GIMP and LMMS, most of it in last 3 hours :D

Development story

Source code
